title: MineMod-Omni-Tool使用问题~~~
author: jaytang
txt_content:
游戏使用sp新安装的，然后就开始使用mmot软件，然后就测试安装一下ModLoader，运行游戏，一开始就出错了，
  Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to C:\Users\jay\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-09-15_23.59.25-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.
